content.raw:
Poking around online, it does seem that red is the standard used for "hotter". Most of them seem to go from blue to yellow to red (low intensity to mid to high). I would recommend having red up top. Looks like in the screenshot, the bar never quite gets to red, but hovers around dark orange. Is that changeable?

https://www.google.com/search?q=heat+map+key&espv=2&biw=1995&bih=1313&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ei=vyNuVNHcNYXVoASD2IKwBw&ved=0CAYQ_AUoAQ#tbm=isch&q=heat+map
content.html:
Poking around online, it does seem that red is the standard used for "hotter". Most of them seem to go from blue to yellow to red (low intensity to mid to high). I would recommend having red up top. Looks like in the screenshot, the bar never quite gets to red, but hovers around dark orange. Is that changeable?
